definition: a deep bow with the foot drawn backwards (indicating excessive humility)
details:
noun
- a deep bow with the foot drawn backwards (indicating excessive humility)
= example: a deep bow with the foot drawn backwards (indicating excessive humility)
= synonyms: scrape
- a harsh noise made by scraping
= synonyms: scratch
- (usually plural) a fragment scraped off of something and collected
